title: N-escapable Killer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player each night. You may not target players whose Discord usernames start with the letter "n", lowercase or uppercase.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You instead deal an Overkill attack if you target a player whose Discord username starts with the letter "a", lowercase or uppercase.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all other roles whose names start with the letters "N" or "A" (lowercase or uppercase).

desc:
Post 17
*I fucking hate Asew, Accent, and Action specifically.*
